songs.title: This
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
This is the start of something beautiful
This is the start of something new
You are the one that make me lose it all
You are the start of something new, ooh

[Hook 1]
And I throw it all away
Watch you fall into my arms again
And I throw it all away
Watch you fall, now

[Bridge 1]
You are the earth that I will stand upon
You are the words that I will sing

[Hook 2]
And I've thrown it all away
Watched you fall into his arms again
And I've thrown it all away
Watched you fall, now

[Bridge 2]
And take me back
Take me home
Watch me fall, down to earth
Take me back, home

[Outro]
This is start of something beautiful
You are the start of something new
